sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Col, Row, Container } from "../components/Grid"; import API from "../utils/API"; function Profile( props) { const [profile, setProfile] = useState({ first: "", last: "", username: "", email: "" }) const [car, setCar] = useState({ make: "", model: "", color: "", year: "", seats: "", }) useEffect(() => { const userProfile = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("currentUser")); setProfile({ first: userProfile.firstname, last: userProfile.lastname, username: userProfile.username, email: userProfile.email }); handleCar(); }, []); const handleCar = ((userProfile) => { API.findUserCar() .then(response => { console.log(response) setCar({ make: response.data.userCar.make, model: response.data.userCar.model, year: response.data.userCar.year, color: response.data.userCar.color, seats: response.data.userCar.seats }) }) .catch(err => { console.log(err) }) }) return (
User Profile
  • Name: {profile.first} {profile.last}
  • Username: {profile.username}
  • Email: {profile.email}
User Car
  • Make: {car.make}
  • Model: {car.model}
  • Color: {car.color}
  • Year: {car.year}
  • Seats: {car.seats}
Available Resorts
  • A-Basin
  • Aspen
  • Breckenridge
  • Copper Mountain
  • Crested Butte
  • Eldora
  • Keystone
  • Loveland
  • Steamboat
  • Telluride
  • Vail
) } export default Profile;
